snippet.title: GeoGuessr World Championship Trailer
snippet.description:
Get Ready for the GeoGuessr World Championship - A Global Showdown of Exploration and Competition! 

Learn more at www.geoguessr.com/world-championship

We've got some incredible news to share with you all. Brace yourselves for the most amazing event in the history of GeoGuessr - the GeoGuessr World Championship! It's time to take our joint love for exploration and competition to a whole new level. 

Picture this: The world's top GeoGuessr contenders from around the globe coming together to battle it out on the global stage. Can you imagine the excitement? This event would not have been possible without you being an amazing community, and becoming such a knowledgeable bunch of explorers.

🗓️ Date: October 13th-14th
📍 Location: Space Arena, Stockholm, Sweden, and twitch.tv/geoguessr
💰 Prizepool: $50,000

Get ready to watch as these contenders showcase their skills. Stay tuned for more updates and mark your calendars. This is an event you don't want to miss. Whether you're a seasoned GeoGuessr player or just a fan of esports competitions, the GeoGuessr World Championship promises to be an unforgettable experience for everyone.

Make sure to join this subreddit and follow our social media channels for exclusive content, behind-the-scenes insights, and engaging discussions leading up to the event. Also, keep an eye out here: geoguessr.com/world-cup where we will release more information, and keep your fingers crossed that your favorite will pop up on the list this summer.

Lastly, we are incredibly happy and excited about this event. The GeoGuessr community has been the foundation of making all of this possible and we want to thank each and every one of you deeply!

Keep exploring!
